entry.title: [NETWORK] Git
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT May 25, 21:00 - 22:00 UTC

May 12, 09:05 UTC
Update - Update : The maintenance has been postponed to the 25/05/2022
Start time: 25/05/2022 21:00 UTC
End time: 25/05/2022 22:00 UTC

May 6, 19:57 UTC
Scheduled - Start time :12/05/2022 21:00UTC
End time :12/05/2022 22:00UTC
Service impact : All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade; however, Console User Interface, Git, and Crons will be unavailable during the reindexing of git logs, which may take up to 6 hours for the biggest Git repositories.
Projects provisioning is not impacted.
Service improvement : Git needs to be upgrated
